widgets_values:
In a world... where the line between memory and madness has vanished...

You wake up in an abandoned asylum. No exit. No explanation. Only the echo of your own name... whispered by something that isn't there.

Every door you open remembers you.  
Every shadow knows your fear.  
And every choice you make... feeds the darkness.

This fall...  
Terror isn’t something you run from...  
It’s something you wear.

Are you sure you're alone?

Welcome to SANCTUM —

Voice Style: Deep, cinematic, dramatic male narrator voice, similar to Don LaFontaine
Accent: Neutral American
Emotion: Ominous, suspenseful, slowly intensifying
Pacing: Slow with dramatic pauses, gradually building tension
Use Case: Horror game trailer
Instructions: Read the following lines with rising suspense. Emphasize the pauses and let the fear breathe in the silence.

In a world... where the line between memory and madness has vanished...

You wake up in an abandoned asylum. No exit. No explanation. Only the echo of your own name... whispered by something that isn't there.

Every door you open remembers you.  
Every shadow knows your fear.  
And every choice you make... feeds the darkness.

This fall...  
Terror isn’t something you run from...  
It’s something you wear.

Are you sure you're alone?

Welcome to SANCTUM —
